name: The Past Face of NDCC #0079
description:
Genderless, 35/330, Loop 1/3. 

**

It is a side project of NDCC in memory of those who died because of the plague from Dark-Cyan Crow in the same named novel. There are genderless, female, male, and persons who cannot be identified because of decay.

**

Mint Rules:

1. The total 1111 faces are composition of 330 genderless, 330 female, 330 male, 110 decay faces, and 11 special roles.
2. There will be 3x3 loops of 22, 33, and 55 faces minted until the number reaches #1100.
3. The price is related to the number of mints.
4. Every Objkt of this series will be only 1 edition.
5. The minting date will released on twitter @articpoor.

**

Brief of NDCC:

NDCC (Notes of Dark-Cyan Crow) are NFTs generated by AI art, derived from the ongoing novel of the same name, and are also the carriers of a multi-dimensional experiment that act as links between NDCC story characters, author, and each minter on the Tezos blockchain. The distribution of projects as below:
・Main: Note of Drak-Cyan Crows (on akaSwap)
・Side 1: NDCC Drafts (on akaSwap)
・Side 2: The Face of The Past (on teia)

**
